quiz.settings: Please review the syllabus at [https://fall2023.byucs110.org/syllabus/](https://fall2023.byucs110.org/syllabus/) before completing this quiz.
quiz.question:
Match the type of assignment with how you can work with your classmates
Labs work with a partner, discuss and write code together, produce your own version without copying and pasting
Homeworks discuss on a whiteboard or on paper with a friend, share drawings, write all of your own code
Projects work entirely on your own, do not discuss with other students

Where is the TA lab located? TMCB 1119
EB 242
TMCB 1111
EB 122

What should I use TA office hours for? To ask a specific question about a problem I have found in my code
Time for TA's to write my code for me
Ask questions about things I didn't understand from the lecture
Work on homework and study for exams

question.correct: The link for discord is on Canvas

question.incorrect: If I'm not sure how to do a problem, I can ask ChatGPT and then turn in the code it gives me.
question.incorrect-comments:
You should look at the course guide (on the course website) for examples of how to do an assignment.
Looking online for ideas and examples is also a helpful way to learn, but you should never turn in code you did not write yourself.
question.correct-comments:
You should look at the course guide (on the course website) for examples of how to do an assignment.
Looking online for ideas and examples is also a helpful way to learn, but you should never turn in code you did not write yourself.

question.correct: I know how to contact my instructor if I need help.
